mapper.select: SELECT pl.supply_cd supplyCode, sup.supply_nm supplyName, prod.prod_nm productName, pl.purch_qty purchaseQty, pl.purch_total_amt purchaseTotalAmount, ui.name scmManager, pl.direction_date directionDate, o.STTcd sttCode, o.order_cd orderCode FROM tb_scm_purchase_list pl JOIN tb_order o ON o.order_cd = pl.order_cd JOIN tb_userinfo ui ON ui.loginID = pl.scm_id JOIN tb_scm_supply sup ON sup.supply_cd = pl.supply_cd JOIN tb_scm_product prod ON prod.product_cd = pl.product_cd ORDER BY pl.purch_list_no LIMIT #{pageIndex}, #{pageSize}
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT order_cd) tot_cnt FROM tb_scm_purchase_list;

SELECT rl.submit_date submitDate, sui.company_cd customerCode, ui.name customerName, prod.prod_nm productName, o.refund_cnt refundQty, ROUND(o.refund_amt*(10/11)) refundAmount, ROUND(o.refund_amt*(10/11)*0.1) refundTax, o.refund_amt totalRefundAmount, uscm.name scmManager, o.STTcd sttCode, o.order_cd orderCode FROM tb_scm_refund_list rl LEFT JOIN tb_order o ON o.order_cd = rl.order_cd LEFT JOIN tb_userinfo ui ON o.loginID = ui.loginID LEFT JOIN tb_userinfo uscm ON rl.scm_id = uscm.loginID LEFT JOIN tb_scm_userinfo sui ON sui.loginID = o.loginID LEFT JOIN tb_scm_product prod ON prod.product_cd = o.product_cd
